scenario_text.value:
This shrine goes farther in than I first
expected.
Yeah. As far as I know—
Hm?
Renamon? What is it?
Shh! I thought I heard something!

Shit! Next time we meet, I’ll make you
regret—
(Hey, that voice!)
Hey! It’s them!
Tch... They found us.
Dammit! I knew it!
Wh-what the heck are you guys doing here?!

What, he says... Ain’t it obvious? We’re
going straight for the Master!

I suppose you were all off licking your
wounds... Am I correct?
Ulp... How’d you know?!

We knocked you jerks on your asses with that
last fight, huh?

Now you’ve done it! I guess you need another
lesson in pain?!

No... Don’t tell me they mean to fight us
here?!

No way! But they’re still injured from the
last battle!

You say that, but they ain’t looking for
peace. More like a piece of us!
We should just take the fight to them, yeah?
(So it’s really come to this?!)
(What strategy should we follow, here?)
Take them head-on!
Strike first!
Try and talk first.
Meet them head-on!
For now...let’s take them head-on!
Got it, Takuma! Leave it to me!

Looks like you’re ready for what’s coming!
Kenzokuuu! GO GET ’EM!
Kishhaaaaaah!
You’ll not defeat us so easily!
Yeah! I’d say it’s time for payback!
Rrrk...?!
Nooo, you wouldn’t...
Strike first!

We’ve gotta break through here quickly! Let’s
strike first!
In that case, leave it to me.
We’re here for a fight, too!
Ladies and gents... Get ready to RUMBLE!
Ack! They’re coming right for us!
Gah... Rrrgh...
You gotta be kidding!
Try and talk first.
Let’s try and talk things over first!

What, you wanna make nicey-nice? That ain’t
gonna happen, pal!

Come on, Kenzoku! Make mincemeat outta these
sneaky mice!

Hey, that’s not fair! At least hear us out
first!
Ahahaha! And why the heck would we do that?!
Takuma! We’ll lose everyone at this rate!

Damn... It didn’t work! Guess we have to
fight after all!
I’ll take care of this, Takuma!
Gah-shaaaaaa!
Ugh... Bastards...

Uh, huh...? He talked some mad game, but they
fell apart almost instantly.

The previous battle must have taken a real
toll. Their injuries likely hadn’t healed.
Shut up! Wounds like this won’t—
Aaack!

Stop it. There’s nothing to gain from pushing
yourself now.

Big talk for a bunch of traitors... You’re
just here to finish us off anyway, ain’t you?
Then just get on with it!
Instead... How about a deal?
A deal?!

Hand over the Magatama... The one used to
open the door to the inner area.
We’ll leave if you do.
Renamon...

Our goal is to save Miyuki, after all. So...
this works, right?
Yeah, Renamon’s right. So what do you say?

Hmph... Hate to break it to you, but we don’t
have the Magatama. Someone else does.
What?!
You ain’t pulling our leg, are ya?!
Don’t believe me! Fine, do whatever you want!
You’ll just be wasting precious time!
I don’t think he’s lying. What should we do?

If someone else has it, then of course we
have to track them down.
Okay... Then let’s go look somewhere else.
